name: Laptop
description: A high-performance laptop suitable  for all your computing needs.*GB RAM, *TB SSD storage, and a powerful processor.

name: Smartphone
description: A sleek smartphone with a stunning display and advanced camera features.*Incredible battery life and fast charging capabilities.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Experience high-quality sound without the wires.*Noise-cancelling technology and comfortable ear cushions for extended use.

name: Smartwatch
description: Stay connected and track your fitness with this stylish smartwatch.*Features include heart rate monitoring, GPS, and customizable watch faces.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with rich sound quality and deep bass.*Water-resistant design makes it perfect for outdoor use.

name: 4K Television
description: Enjoy stunning 4K resolution and vibrant colors on this large-screen television.*Smart TV features with access to popular streaming services.

name: Gaming Console
description: Next-gen gaming console with immersive graphics and fast load times.*Includes a wireless controller and access to a vast library of games.

name: Digital Camera
description: Capture stunning photos and videos with this high-resolution digital camera.*Features include optical zoom, image stabilization, and Wi-Fi connectivity.

name: E-Reader
description: Lightweight e-reader with a glare-free display for comfortable reading.*Store thousands of books and access a vast library of e-books.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Monitor your daily activity and health metrics with this compact fitness tracker.*Features include step counting, sleep tracking, and heart rate monitoring.

name: Tablet
description: Versatile tablet with a high-resolution display and powerful performance.*Perfect for work, entertainment, and creativity on the go.

name: External Hard Drive
description: Reliable external hard drive with ample storage capacity for your files.*Fast data transfer speeds and durable design for on-the-go use.
